Title: An Act Changing the Name of the Lambunao General Hospital in the Municipality of Lambunao, Province of Iloilo, to Dr. Ricardo Y. Ladrido General Hospital
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 34
An Act Changing the Name of the Lambunao General Hospital in the Municipality of Lambunao, Province of Iloilo, to Dr. Ricardo Y. Ladrido General Hospital
Section 1. The name of the Lambunao General Hospital located in the Municipality of Lambunao Province of Iloilo, is hereby changed to Dr. Ricardo Y. Ladrido General Hospital.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.1awp++i1
Approved: June 27, 1979
